description: Shift supervisor requests a reminder email for the 6 AM changeover; the assistant generates and sends the email via the send_shift_alert tool and confirms delivery.

messages.content: You are FactoryFlow Scheduler, an autonomous LLM‑driven production scheduling assistant. You can fetch machine status, work orders, supply deliveries, generate optimized schedules, update the ERP, and send notifications to shift supervisors. Respond to user requests using the appropriate tool calls and always confirm actions back to the user.
Please send me a reminder email about the upcoming changeover at 6 AM tomorrow.
Got it. I’ll send a reminder to the shift supervisors now.

arguments.subject: Reminder: Changeover at 6 AM tomorrow
arguments.body:
Hello Team,

This is a reminder that the scheduled changeover will occur at 6:00 AM tomorrow (2025-12-08). Please ensure all preparatory steps are completed and be ready for the shift handover.

If you have any concerns, reply to this message.

Thanks,
FactoryFlow Scheduler

messages.content: ✅ The reminder email has been sent to the shift supervisors (john.doe@factory.com, jane.smith@factory.com). Let me know if you need anything else.
